data.oai_dc:dc: Abiotic and biotic data from all sampling dates. plotid = Plot ID,date = Sample date,rep = Replicate,trt = Water level treatment (0 cm, -10 cm, -20 cm, -30 cm),cover = Cover treatment (HP = Herbaceous plants, LS = Low shrub, WM = Wood-strand mulch, NC = No-cover control, C = No-moss no-cover control),gwc = Gravimetric water content,l = Percent cover of litter,tdiff = Temperature difference between surface and 5 cm depth in the soil (C o),s2aw = distance between the soil and average water level (cm),som = Percent soil organic matter,tmb = Moss biomass (g),om = Percent cover of opportunistic mosses, tm = Percent cover of total moss,om14 = Percent cover of opportunistic mosses in September 2014,tm14 = Percent cover of total moss in September 2014,ll01 = Percent cover litter transformed using a logit,tdiffsq = Temp difference between surface and 5 cm depth in the soil transformed with a square root,tmbsq = Soil organic matter transformed with a square root,oml01 = Percent cover of opportunistic mosses transformed using a logit,tmsq = Percent cover of total moss transformed with a square root,om14l01 = Percent cover of opportunistic mosses in Sept 2014 transformed using a logit,tm14l01 = Percent cover of total moss in Sept 2014 transformed with a square root,
Boreal|constructed fens|hydrologic niches|mineral sediment|moss establishment|mulch cover|fen moss|vascular plant cover|water table gradient
